name: BU- Dungeon Duo
description:
BU- Dungeon Duo

Play as a wizard, and use your ghost companion, Bu, to explore your way through dungeons, dodging traps, avoiding enemies, and pushing blocks. Position your ghost carefully to solve 25 unique and challenging puzzle levels, and then challenge yourself with speedrun and full skull mode!

Features
  • 25 Challenging puzzle Levels!
  • Unlock different skins to outfit with!
  • Challenge your skills with speedrun modes!
Controls

Whether you like wasd, arrow keys, or gamepad, your favorite control scheme probably works for this game!
